name: getdefinition
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool dictionary_data_api.
Tool description: A concise linguistic resource delivering pronunciation, definition, part of speech, and example usage for words via a single GET endpoint. Enrich your applications with accurate language insights.
API description: Retrieves the definition, pronunciation, and example usages of a given word using the Dictionary Data API.

word.description: The word for which the definition, pronunciation, and example usages are retrieved.
